texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["Over the Christmas and New Year period, most of the TfL network is open. However, on Christmas Day there's no service on most transport."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
These services are not running today: the Tube, buses, TfL Rail, London Overground, DLR, Trams, River, Emirates Air Line and National Rail.
Taxi and Private Hire; and Santander Cycles are all running today.
See our Status updates map for Tube, Overground, TfL Rail, DLR and tram services for 25 December.
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["No regular bookings. Dial-a-Ride services are for registered members only"]}
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Black cabs will charge an extra Â£4 per journey","There may be an extra charge for private hire vehicles (including minicabs) - check when you book"]}
Santander Cycles are available on Christmas Day and throughout the rest of December.

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Cycle for free this Christmas. Make as many 30-minute journeys as you like within 24 hours free of charge. Use code SCXMAS19","Check availability of Santander Cycles using the \u003ca href=\"/modes/cycling/santander-cycles/find-a-docking-station\"\u003eonline docking station map\u003c/a\u003e ","Download the Santander Cycles app from the \u003ca href=\"https://itunes.apple.com/gb/app/santander-cycles/id974792287?mt=8\"\u003eApp Store\u003c/a\u003e or \u003ca href=\"https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=uk.gov.tfl.cyclehire\u0026hl=en_GB\"\u003eGoogle Play\u003c/a\u003e "]}

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["The \u003ca href=\"https://tfl.gov.uk/modes/driving/congestion-charge\"\u003eCongestion Charge\u003c/a\u003e and \u003ca href=\"https://tfl.gov.uk/modes/driving/ultra-low-emission-zone\"\u003eULEZ charges\u003c/a\u003e do not apply today","The \u003ca href=\"https://tfl.gov.uk/modes/driving/low-emission-zone\"\u003eLEZ\u003c/a\u003e applies at all times","See our \u003ca href=\"https://tfl.gov.uk/traffic/status/?Input=\u0026lineIds=\u0026dateTypeSelect=Future date\u0026direction=\u0026startDate=2019-12-25T00%3a00%3a00\u0026endDate=2019-12-25T23%3a59%3a59\"\u003etraffic status updates map\u003c/a\u003e for Christmas Day"]}
